abstract: Some executives are much more hands-on than others. That was made clear last week during a panel discussion titled “Power Couples — How They Live and Work.”
snippet: Some executives are much more hands-on than others. That was made clear last week during a panel discussion titled “Power Couples — How They Live and Work.”
lead_paragraph: Some executives are much more hands-on than others. That was made clear last week during a panel discussion titled “Power Couples — How They Live and Work” at the 92nd Street Y in New York.

headline.main: Did That Power Dad Get His Hands Dirty?
headline.print_headline: Did That Power Dad Get His Hands Dirty?
